title: Looking for Platinum+ players to join my beginner Co op vs AI team.
body:
Aim:
To be the very best, like no one ever was.

How:
By having 4 of the strongest pokemon by my side as I enter a bot game, we can pulverise the bots.

I'm super serious. 

Must be available at least once a day

replies.body: LOL Beginner bots? You scrub! All hardcore players will enter Intro Bots.
